original_title: Proposal to reduce electricity tariffs to be submitted to PUCSL within two days - Minister
original_body_lines: The Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) is expected to hand over the proposals pertaining to the revision of electricity tariffs to the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) within the next two days, Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekera said.
Wijesekera made this announcement while addressing the Parliament this morning (20 Feb.).
